yaml.title: Summary of SEQLinkage

markdown.markdown:
<!-- WARNING: THIS FILE WAS AUTOGENERATED! DO NOT EDIT! -->

1. Phasing haplotypes in gene regions
2. linkage analysis of all variants
3. linkage analysis of CHP markers
4. non-parametic analysis

## 1. Working on
- linkage analysis of all variants
```
sos run nbs/seqlink_sos.ipynb linkage --cwd data/wg20220316 --fam_path data/new_trim_ped_famless17_no:xx.fam
```
- linkage analysis of CHP markers

## 2. Done
- Phasing haplotypes in gene regions
```
sos run nbs/seqlink_sos.ipynb seqlink --cwd data/wg20220316 --fam_path data/new_trim_ped_famless17_no:xx.fam --vcf_path /mnt/mfs/statgen/alzheimers-family/linkage_files/geno/full_sample/vcf/full_sample.vcf.gz --anno_path MWE/annotation --pop_path data/full_sample_fam_pop.txt
```
